title: Scripting 4 accounts in my  beginner bots game.

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/259495496/202613331?tab=overview

This is the match history showing 4 accounts which were clearly automated.

The 4 players were inactive for 1 minute, then bought same items, and proceeded to follow me around the whole game. They ended up buying all the same items and running into towers - a poorly scripted AI if I do say. I have created much better scripts in my lifetime.

Please remove these accounts from our community.

P.S. I took advantage of the opportunity and spawn killed the enemy AI multiple times.
#AniviaMain
{{champion:34}}
